item.title: Storm declared 'super typhoon' as it hits Philippines
item.description: Typhoon Fung Wong is already bringing "life threatening conditions" to one eastern island, with widespread disruption expected later.

item.title: US authorities ground cargo plane model after Kentucky air disaster
item.description: Three firms told to stop operating MD-11 and MD-11F planes until safety checks are carried out.

item.title: How this year’s Christmas ads ‘let real life in,’ from cost of living to masculinity
item.description: We look at the Christmas ads that are out so far - and what they tell us about the year that’s been.

item.title: Honesty boxes should be dying like cash. But many are flourishing
item.description: Once found by the roadside offering local produce for a few pence, honesty boxes are being reborn via social media.

item.title: Ever feel the need to switch off? Your vagus nerve might hold the key
item.description: You might not have heard of it, but can training your vagus nerve give you a moment or two of peace?
